content:
Hey, FHIR community! We are looking for star speakers for the long-awaited much anticipated inaugural FHIR meetup in Los Angeles on Tuesday, Jan 15 from 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm at the WeWork Manhattan Beach https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev-LA/events/257387246/.

Please ping me if you are eager to spread FHIR in SoCal. Of course, we are inviting all Angelinos and guests of the city to attend.

Hey, FHIR community! We are looking for star speakers for the long-awaited much anticipated inaugural FHIR meetup in Los Angeles on Tuesday, Jan 15 from 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm at the WeWork Manhattan Beach https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev-LA/events/257387246/.

Please ping me if you are eager to spread FHIR in SoCal. Of course, we are inviting all Angelinos and guests of the city to attend.

Hi @Pavel Smirnov - any considerations for streaming your meetup on the web / youtube / twitch etc ? I will start attending when possible. Thanks

@Nilesh Pagare We've been recording one in San Francisco, I should be able to post the links to the videos soon. The first LA meetup will be smaller and we do not plan to record/stream but we can do it with the next one if there is an interest.

@Nilesh Pagare We've been recording one in San Francisco, I should be able to post the links to the videos soon. The first LA meetup will be smaller and we do not plan to record/stream but we can do it with the next one if there is an interest.

:+1:

Hi, everyone! I am looking for speakers for the FHIR meetup in Los Angeles on the Jun, 5th from 6 pm to 9 pm. The event will be hosted by ScaleLA https://www.scalela.com/, which is a Los Angeles Digital Health Hub. The location is beautiful, and it also brings together a whole bunch of health IT innovators from Los Angeles. It is an excellent opportunity to share your FHIR story with an attentive audience or maybe rehearse your Dev Days talk. Please reach out if you want to speak.

Hi, everyone! I am looking for one more speaker for our second FHIR meetup in LA on Oct, 3. Please message me if you like to present your FHIR work. We had 80+ attendees at the first FHIR meetup in LA. https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev-LA/events/264405233/
